title.value: DIFFUSION OF 220RN AND 212PB IN DIFFUSING ALPHA-EMITTER RADIATION THERAPY DOSIMETRY WITH GEANT4
title.justification: The title is clearly stated at the beginning of the section discussing the usage of Geant4 for DaRT dosimetry.
title.quote: DIFFUSION OF 220RN AND 212PB IN DIFFUSING ALPHA-EMITTER RADIATION THERAPY DOSIMETRY WITH GEANT4

extractions.description: This paper discusses the implementation of diffusion of alpha-emitting atoms in radiation therapy dosimetry using Geant4, specifically focusing on the dosimetry of DaRT where diffusion contributes to dose distribution around the source.

type.justification: The paper involves empirical investigations using simulations to measure dose distributions and compare with reported data.
type.quote: The aim of this study was to investigate the dosimetry of DaRT with the Geant4 Monte Carlo (MC) toolkit.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on radiation therapy dosimetry, specifically through simulation and analysis of dose distributions.
name.quote: The aim of this study was to investigate the dosimetry of DaRT with the Geant4 Monte Carlo (MC) toolkit.

name.justification: The study involves heavy usage of Monte Carlo simulations with the Geant4 toolkit to perform the dosimetry analysis.
name.quote: The diffusion equations of the two diffusing daughters (^{220}Rn and ^{212}Pb) were solved using an in-house Matlab script. The results were used as input to an in-house MC-based Geant4 user-code developed for DaRT dosimetry.

name.justification: The paper focuses on the use of diffusing alpha-emitter radiation therapy and its dosimetry.
name.quote: Diffusing alpha-emitter radiation therapy (DaRT) is a novel brachytherapy treatment modality that uses short-lived alpha-emitting atoms generated from ^{224}Ra decaying.

name.justification: Geant4 is explicitly mentioned as the Monte Carlo (MC) toolkit used for the simulations.
name.quote: The aim of this study was to investigate the dosimetry of DaRT with the Geant4 Monte Carlo (MC) toolkit.

referenced_paper_title.value: DIFFUSION OF 220RN AND 212PB IN DIFFUSING ALPHA-EMITTER RADIATION THERAPY DOSIMETRY WITH GEANT4
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced title is the same as the paper title.
referenced_paper_title.quote: DIFFUSION OF 220RN AND 212PB IN DIFFUSING ALPHA-EMITTER RADIATION THERAPY DOSIMETRY WITH GEANT4
